attributes.action: Reduce Global warming by making Microsoft  maintain full support for windows XP or else pay for the environmental impact of Vista.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Microsoft is incredibly dominant in the Operating Stystems market. Windows Vista is well known for its incredible graphics demands compared to Windows XP. Essentially the Environmental impacts of Vista is huge, both in replacement of perfectly servicable but "not Windows Vista-Ready" PC`s and in the electrity overhead. Vista is neither needed nor wanted by many, yet most PCs will be running it in a few years by default as XP is being phased out. We would like Mr Blair to urge Microsoft either to maintain full support for Windows XP, or else to pay for the environmental impact of Vista on the UK.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
